languages.text: "Нет, Лорд-капитан, и, поверьте, я бы хотел оставаться в этом блаженном неведении до своего последнего дня. Даже знание того, что это... эта... бездна вообще существует, отравляет мое сознание".

traits.locale_text: "Нет, Лорд-капитан, и, поверьте, я бы хотел оставаться в этом блаженном неведении до своего последнего дня. Даже знание того, что это... эта... бездна вообще существует, отравляет мое сознание".

languages.text: "No, Lord Captain, and, trust me, I hope to remain in this state of blissful ignorance until my dying day. Just knowing that this... this abyss exists at all is enough to poison my mind."
languages.original_text: "Нет, Лорд-капитан, и, поверьте, я бы хотел оставаться в этом блаженном неведении до своего последнего дня. Даже знание того, что это... эта... бездна вообще существует, отравляет мое сознание".

traits.locale_text: "No, Lord Captain, and, trust me, I hope to remain in this state of blissful ignorance until my dying day. Just knowing that this... this... abyss exists at all is enough to poison my mind."
"No, Lord Captain, and, trust me, I hope to remain in this state of blissful ignorance until my dying day. Just knowing that this... this... abyss exists at all is enough to poison my mind."
"No, Lord Captain, and, trust me, I hope to remain in this state of blissful ignorance until my dying day. Just knowing that this... this... abyss exists at all is enough to poison my mind."
"No, Lord Captain, and, trust me, I hope to remain in this state of blissful ignorance until my dying day. Just knowing that this... this... abyss exists at all is enough to poison my mind."

languages.text: “并不了解，舰长大人。而且老实说，我希望能保持这种幸福的无知，直到我死去的那天为止。光是知道了这个……这个……深渊的存在，就足以毒害我的心灵。”
languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain, and, trust me, I hope to remain in this state of blissful ignorance until my dying day. Just knowing that this... this abyss exists at all is enough to poison my mind."

traits.locale_text: “并不了解，舰长大人。而且老实说，我希望能保持这种幸福的无知，直到我死去的那天为止。光是知道了这个……这个……深渊的存在，就足以毒害我的心灵。”
“并不了解，舰长大人。而且老实说，我希望能保持这种幸福的无知，直到我死去的那天为止。光是知道了这个……这个……深渊的存在，就足以毒害我的心灵。”

languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain, and, trust me, I hope to remain in this state of blissful ignorance until my dying day. Just knowing that this... this... abyss exists at all is enough to poison my mind."

languages.text: «No, Lord Capitán, y créame que espero seguir felizmente ignorante el resto de mis días. Solo con saber que este... este abismo existe, ya basta para envenenar mi mente».
languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain, and, trust me, I hope to remain in this state of blissful ignorance until my dying day. Just knowing that this... this abyss exists at all is enough to poison my mind."

traits.locale_text: «No, Lord Capitán, y créame que espero seguir felizmente ignorante el resto de mis días. Solo con saber que este... este... abismo existe, ya basta para envenenar mi mente».

languages.text: 「いいえ、ロード・キャプテン、どうか信じてください。私は、死ぬその日まで、至福の無垢の様でありたいと願っています。これを…この…深淵の存在を知るだけで、私の心は毒されてしまうのです」
languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain, and, trust me, I hope to remain in this state of blissful ignorance until my dying day. Just knowing that this... this abyss exists at all is enough to poison my mind."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、ロード・キャプテン、どうか信じてください。私は、死ぬその日まで、至福の無垢の様でありたいと願っています。これを…この…深淵の存在を知るだけで、私の心は毒されてしまうのです」
「いいえ、ロード・キャプテン、どうか信じてください。私は、死ぬその日まで、至福の無垢の様でありたいと願っています。これを…この…深淵の存在を知るだけで、私の心は毒されてしまうのです」

languages.text: "Nein, Lord Captain, und vertraut mir: Ich hoffe sehr, bis zum Tage meines Todes in diesem seligen Unwissen zu leben. Allein das Wissen, dass dieser ... dieser Abgrund existiert, reicht schon aus, um meinen Verstand zu vergiften."
languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain, and, trust me, I hope to remain in this state of blissful ignorance until my dying day. Just knowing that this... this abyss exists at all is enough to poison my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, Lord Captain, und vertraut mir: Ich hoffe sehr, bis zum Tage meines Todes in diesem seligen Unwissen zu leben. Allein das Wissen, dass dieser ... dieser ... Abgrund existiert, reicht schon aus, um meinen Verstand zu vergiften."

"Nein, Lord Captain, und vertraut mir: Ich hoffe sehr, bis zum Tage meines Todes in diesem seligen Unwissen zu leben. Allein das Wissen, dass dieser ... dieser ... Abgrund existiert, reicht schon aus, um meinen Verstand zu vergiften."

languages.text: « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et laissez-moi vous dire que j'espère rester dans l'ignorance jusqu'à la fin de mes jours. Le simple fait de savoir que ce... cet abîme existe suffit à empoisonner mon esprit. »
languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain, and, trust me, I hope to remain in this state of blissful ignorance until my dying day. Just knowing that this... this abyss exists at all is enough to poison my mind."

traits.locale_text: « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et laissez-moi vous dire que j'espère rester dans l'ignorance jusqu'à la fin de mes jours. Le simple fait de savoir que ce... cet abîme existe suffit à empoisonner mon esprit. »

languages.text: "Yok Lord Kaptan. İnanın, son nefesimi verene dek bu durumun böyle kalmasını yeğlerim. Bu... Bu hiçliğin varlığını dahi bilmek... Aklımı yeterince meşgul ediyor."
languages.original_text: "No, Lord Captain, and, trust me, I hope to remain in this state of blissful ignorance until my dying day. Just knowing that this... this abyss exists at all is enough to poison my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Yok Lord Kaptan. İnanın, son nefesimi verene dek bu durumun böyle kalmasını yeğlerim. Bu... Bu hiçliğin varlığını dahi bilmek... Aklımı yeterince meşgul ediyor."
